config.annotationData: <criteria> <flowFilePolicy>USE_CLONE</flowFilePolicy> <rules> <actions> <attribute>prefetchCode</attribute> <id>9bfc79d4-3595-4b66-a70c-c575f931a713</id> <value>import java.util.Date; import java.util.Calendar; import java.text.SimpleDateFormat; import scala.io.Source; import org.apache.http.client.methods._; import org.apache.http.impl.client.DefaultHttpClient; import org.apache.http.entity.StringEntity; import scala.collection.mutable; val requestQuery = new HttpPost(\"http://${druidBrokerHost}:${druidBrokerPort}/druid/v2\"); requestQuery.setHeader(\"Content-Type\",\"application/json\"); requestQuery.setEntity(new StringEntity(\"{\\\"queryType\\\":\\\"select\\\",\\\"dataSource\\\":\\\"${tableName}\\\",\\\"intervals\\\":[\\\"${sdate}/${edate}\\\"],\\\"granularity\\\":\\\"${granularity}\\\",\\\"dimensions\\\":[\\\"${tagColumnName}\\\"],\\\"metrics\\\":[\\\"${metricColumnName}\\\"],\\\"filter\\\": {\\\"type\\\": \\\"selector\\\",\\\"dimension\\\":\\\"${tagColumnName}\\\",\\\"value\\\":\\\"${tagName}\\\"},\\\"pagingSpec\\\":{\\\"pagingIdentifiers\\\":{},\\\"threshold\\\":5}}\")); val httpClient = new DefaultHttpClient(); val httpResponse = httpClient.execute(requestQuery); val content = Option(httpResponse.getEntity()).map{ entity => val inputStream = entity.getContent(); try {Source.fromInputStream(inputStream).getLines.mkString} finally {inputStream.close();httpClient.getConnectionManager().shutdown();}}.getOrElse(\"\"); val contentRDD = sc.parallelize(Seq(content)); val contentDF = spark.read.json(contentRDD).select(\"result.events.event\"); val dataDF = contentDF.withColumn(\"function\", explode(contentDF(\"event.function\"))).withColumn(\"timestamp\", explode(contentDF(\"event.timestamp\"))).withColumn(\"value\", explode(contentDF(\"event.${metricColumnName}\"))).drop(\"event\");</value> </actions> <conditions> <expression>${prefetch:equals('true')}</expression> <id>de585174-e662-4856-964c-de046c1e6623</id> </conditions> <conditions> <expression>${http.request.uri:contains("/scala/")}</expression> <id>b4d54d61-b6a1-4560-beb0-9413af66a736</id> </conditions> <id>87dd4098-d360-4079-a1ea-71e343ec3e2b</id> <name>prefetchScala</name> </rules> <rules> <actions> <attribute>prefetchCode</attribute> <id>d211f28b-f552-418e-a16c-3827b197aebe</id> <value>import json, pprint, requests, textwrap druidUrl = 'http://${druidBrokerHost}:${druidBrokerPort}/druid/v2' headers = {'Content-Type':'application/json','X-Requested-by':'User'} requestData = \"{\\\"queryType\\\":\\\"select\\\",\\\"dataSource\\\":\\\"${tableName}\\\",\\\"intervals\\\":[\\\"${sdate}/${edate}\\\"],\\\"granularity\\\":\\\"${granularity}\\\",\\\"dimensions\\\":[\\\"${tagColumnName}\\\"],\\\"metrics\\\":[\\\"${metricColumnName}\\\"],\\\"filter\\\": {\\\"type\\\": \\\"selector\\\",\\\"dimension\\\":\\\"${tagColumnName}\\\",\\\"value\\\":\\\"${tagName}\\\"},\\\"pagingSpec\\\":{\\\"pagingIdentifiers\\\":{},\\\"threshold\\\":5}}\"\ncontent = requests.post(druidUrl, headers=headers, data=requestData).json() contentRDD = sc.parallelize(content) dataDF = spark.read.json(contentRDD.map(lambda x: x['result']['events']).flatMap(lambda x: map(lambda y: y['event'],x)).map(lambda x: json.dumps(x))) </value> </actions> <conditions> <expression>${prefetch:equals('true')}</expression> <id>b776209d-01ba-4f7a-82e3-01e3a4d87749</id> </conditions> <conditions> <expression>${http.request.uri:contains("/python/")}</expression> <id>8193eb88-74ff-4b8d-bc66-def70e9260f9</id> </conditions> <id>5ece2b51-c200-46dc-b384-dfb9782bb495</id> <name>prefetchPython</name> </rules> <rules> <actions> <attribute>prefetchCode</attribute> <id>81594357-ab0b-4b7e-9e97-c6b26775210d</id> <value></value> </actions> <conditions> <expression>${prefetch:equals('true')}</expression> <id>5c26cbe1-e684-431b-9c3c-65af21c50d47</id> </conditions> <conditions> <expression>${http.request.uri:contains("/R/")}</expression> <id>18555388-afb8-4016-8135-6d1d137bd1c0</id> </conditions> <id>bab10abd-d29b-467c-8ca8-09a21796fdee</id> <name>prefetchR</name> </rules> </criteria>

<criteria>
    <flowFilePolicy>USE_CLONE</flowFilePolicy>
    <rules>
        <actions>
            <attribute>code</attribute>
            <id>955d4f11-f676-4eeb-b0ac-bc8c8db7b8aa</id>
            <value>val p = dataDF.select(\"timestamp\",\"value\").rdd.map{
    row => val dateFormat = new SimpleDateFormat(\"yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSS'Z'\"); 
    val cal = Calendar.getInstance(); 
    cal.setTime(dateFormat.parse(row(0).asInstanceOf[String])); 
    val millis = cal.getTimeInMillis(); (millis,row(1).asInstanceOf[Double])
    }.collect.toList; 

val s = dataDF.select(\"timestamp\",\"value\").filter($\"timestamp\">\"${psdate}\"&&$\"timestamp\"<=\"${pedate}\").rdd.map{row => val dateFormat = new SimpleDateFormat(\"yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSS'Z'\"); 
    val cal = Calendar.getInstance(); 
    cal.setTime(dateFormat.parse(row(0).asInstanceOf[String])); 
    val millis = cal.getTimeInMillis(); 
    (millis,row(1).asInstanceOf[Double])}.collect.toList;

val pSlide = p.sliding(2,1).toArray;
val pRatioArr = pSlide.map( x => (x(0)._1, x(0)._2, x(0)._2 / x(1)._2) );
val slideR = s.sliding(2,1).toArray;
val ratioRArr = slideR.map(x=> (x(0)._1, x(0)._2, x(0)._2 / x(1)._2) );
val sameLength = ratioRArr.sliding(8,1).toArray; 

val deltaArr = sameLength.map {sRatioArr => var deltas = Array[Tuple4[Long,Double,Double,Double]](); 
    var count = 0; 
    while (count < sRatioArr.length) { 
        deltas = deltas :+ (
            sRatioArr(count)._1, 
            sRatioArr(count)._2, 
            sRatioArr(count)._3, 
            Math.abs(sRatioArr(count)._3 - pRatioArr(count)._3)
        ); 
        count = count+1;
    }; 
    deltas; 
};
  
val scored = deltaArr.map {
    arr =>
    ( arr, arr
    .map {
        case (time, value, ratio, diff) => diff
    }.sum / arr.length )
};

val matches = scored.filter{ x =>  (x._2 <= .65) };

matches.foreach(println);
 
case class TS (time: Long, value: Double);
 
val tsArray = matches.map {
    tup => tup._1.map {
        case (time, value, ratio, diff) => TS(time, value)
   }
};

//println(\"********************\")
tsArray.foreach{x => print(\"[\"); 
x.map{x => print(\"[\"+x.time+\",\"+x.value+\"],\") }; 
print(\"],\"); }
//println(\"********************\")
</value>
        </actions>
        <conditions>
            <expression>${http.request.uri:contains("/pattern")}</expression>
            <id>4befafb1-8d7f-4382-8fd3-12c013b96fae</id>
        </conditions>
        <id>9fa26473-fd96-4b3d-a67e-f3bf0191c527</id>
        <name>pattern</name>
    </rules>
    <rules>
        <actions>
            <attribute>code</attribute>
            <id>e4b63b60-24f1-48e2-8665-df61c9b99d88</id>
            <value>println(\"Scala Job Success\");
dataDF.show;</value>
        </actions>
        <conditions>
            <expression>${http.request.uri:contains("/projection")}</expression>
            <id>567a8495-2213-4a6a-9385-2cab683964e9</id>
        </conditions>
        <id>4a66c162-5fb1-4e8a-a98a-fd40845429c1</id>
        <name>projection</name>
    </rules>
    <rules>
        <actions>
            <attribute>code</attribute>
            <id>600765ec-100c-4b44-8ed9-c4903c48ee86</id>
            <value>dataDF.show</value>
        </actions>
        <conditions>
            <expression>${http.request.uri:contains("/scalaTest")}</expression>
            <id>b9517bc3-7f6d-460a-816e-91567837cffd</id>
        </conditions>
        <id>e9044882-2d02-4b18-8dcb-b90489c0847d</id>
        <name>scalaTest</name>
    </rules>
</criteria>

config.annotationData: <criteria> <flowFilePolicy>USE_CLONE</flowFilePolicy> <rules> <actions> <attribute>SQLString</attribute> <id>6df707b9-3e91-4fd1-8415-ed4a6f2757a4</id> <value>SELECT a.period, AVG(a.${metricColumnName}) OVER (ROWS BETWEEN 10 PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW) FROM ( SELECT `__time` AS period, `${tagColumnName}` AS func, SUM(${metricColumnName}) as ${metricColumnName} FROM ${tableName} WHERE `${tagColumnName}` = '${tagName}' AND `__time` >= '${sdate}' AND `__time` <= '${edate}' GROUP BY `${tagColumnName}`, `__time`) AS a</value> </actions> <conditions> <expression>${requestedFunction:equals('mov_avg')}</expression> <id>4c227bf6-63e0-4d31-b6ce-b9cf81466f22</id> </conditions> <conditions> <expression>${granularity:toLower():equals('none')}</expression> <id>13ea167a-d740-4d09-8c5a-06245bee535f</id> </conditions> <id>011fa7da-f2fe-422b-af23-1ed8e3dfe942</id> <name>mov_avg_raw</name> </rules> <rules> <actions> <attribute>SQLString</attribute> <id>5383e7d9-9694-4cc6-85bb-e0028b8b69bc</id> <value>SELECT a.period, AVG(a.${metricColumnName}) OVER (ROWS BETWEEN 10 PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW) FROM ( SELECT floor_${granularity}(`__time`) AS period, `${tagColumnName}` AS func, SUM(${metricColumnName}) as ${metricColumnName} FROM ${tableName} WHERE `${tagColumnName}` = '${tagName}' AND `__time` >= '${sdate}' AND `__time` <= '${edate}' GROUP BY `${tagColumnName}`, floor_${granularity}(`__time`)) as a</value> </actions> <conditions> <expression>${granularity:toLower():equals('none'):not()}</expression> <id>6e84b280-2e68-4f68-b269-8a69d92537ff</id> </conditions> <conditions> <expression>${requestedFunction:equals('mov_avg')}</expression> <id>95ebaf0f-123b-4efd-854a-e90fbcf3bb19</id> </conditions> <id>c6169ea1-325b-4184-b230-a2806a408e05</id> <name>mov_avg</name> </rules> <rules> <actions> <attribute>SQLString</attribute> <id>e28b7f72-c478-4f1b-b007-343d302d2140</id> <value>SELECT `__time`, ${metricColumnName} FROM ${tableName} WHERE `${tagColumnName}` = '${tagName}' and `__time` >= '${sdate}' and `__time` <= '${edate}'</value> </actions> <conditions> <expression>${granularity:toLower():equals('none')}</expression> <id>db6b5c3e-76cd-4bed-8199-ce99d2860ee9</id> </conditions> <conditions> <expression>${requestedFunction:equals('sum'):or(${requestedFunction:equals('min'):or(${requestedFunction:equals('max'):or(${requestedFunction:equals('avg')})})})}</expression> <id>a5d3aebf-a0f0-49aa-bc49-c066382526d6</id> </conditions> <id>255bc62a-c3ac-42cc-a875-b49dc3ffa8e9</id> <name>base_function_raw</name> </rules> <rules> <actions> <attribute>SQLString</attribute> <id>e4a51e4e-5a5a-4060-907d-3e662a9fd77e</id> <value>SELECT floor_${granularity}(`__time`) AS `time`, ${function}(${metricColumnName}) AS `${metricColumnName}`, `${tagColumnName}` AS `${tagColumnName}` FROM ${tableName} WHERE ${tagNames:replace('[','(`${tagColumnName}`='):replace(',',' OR `${tagColumnName}`='):replace(']',')'):replace('"','\'')} AND `__time` >= '${sdate}' AND `__time` <= '${edate}' GROUP BY floor_${granularity}(`__time`), `${tagColumnName}`</value> </actions> <conditions> <expression>${granularity:toLower():equals('none'):not()}</expression> <id>12717fa9-992f-40cb-82ee-c2b1bd75d188</id> </conditions> <conditions> <expression>${requestedFunction:equals('sum'):or(${requestedFunction:equals('min'):or(${requestedFunction:equals('max'):or(${requestedFunction:equals('avg')})})})}</expression> <id>ecfb22a2-8715-4cf1-b86e-e75c7aa6e393</id> </conditions> <id>d4d5ad5f-99e5-41de-8ce3-8c0587634bd9</id> <name>base_function</name> </rules> </criteria>
